answers.answer: I have been measurimg 4 weeks ahead since 28 weeks and im getting my date for induction tomorrow because baby is alredi reli big
Good luck, Steph!  Hope all goes well.  Report back what your "4 week ahead" munchkin's birthweight officially came in at. :-)

question: When I had my genetic screening ultrasound at 14 weeks my baby was measuring 2 weeks ahead in size.  This was also the case when at my 20 week anatomy ultrasound when he measured 2 weeks ahead.I'm now 29weeks 5days.  My fundal height is measuring 2½ weeks ahead.Soooooo, this leads me to believe my baby will be born early, or GINORMOUS.  I'm a bit nervous as I did not experience this with my previous three children.  FYI, my ovulation/comception dates are not in question bc Ive been charting my cycles for years and we were actively TTC with ovulation test strips.  So there is no way I have a 2 week conception discrepancy.  I also do not have diabetes.Anyone else measuring ahead of schedule??
title: measuring 2½ weeks ahead
